channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Las Vegas Sands slaps down worries that U.S.-China tensions could threaten its Macau casinos
item.description: "We have an incredible relationship with Beijing," CEO Rob Goldstein said on the casino operator's earnings call.

item.title: Goldman Sachs execs’ images used in deepfake video campaign on Instagram
item.description: It may come as a surprise to many to see Abby Joseph Cohen pop up in your Instagram feed with an offer that’s hard to refuse.

item.title: Russian Attack on Kyiv Kills 8, Ukrainian Officials Say
item.description: The assault was the deadliest on Ukraine’s capital in nearly a year. It came just hours after the Trump administration again threatened to walk away f...

item.title: Ukraine’s Next Steps
item.description: The U.S. is urging Ukraine to take a deal that favors Russia.

item.title: Norfolk Southern alone should pay for $600 million settlement in fiery 2023 Ohio derailment disaster, jury rules
item.description: An Ohio jury decided Wednesday that GATX isn't liable for the settlement even though the failure of a bearing on its railcar carrying plastic pellets ...

item.title: Trump’s Latest Demands on Ukraine, and a White House Crypto Contest
item.description: Plus, how to actually fall asleep.

item.title: Google is demanding some remote workers move within 50 miles of an office and show up three days a week or risk losing their jobs
item.description: Google has told some remote workers that their jobs could be at risk if they don't start attending the office three days per week.

item.title: Fed report uses the word ‘uncertainty’ 80 times and global stock markets don’t know where to go
item.description: U.S. stock indexes closed up yesterday following news that the Trump administration would compromise on some aspects of its tariff agenda. But trading...

item.title: Mourners Pay Respect to Pope Francis as Cardinals Fine Tune Funeral Plans
item.description: The conclave to select the next pontiff has not started yet, but meetings to set the agenda and to decide on the logistics of mourning for Francis wer...

item.title: Victims and Eyewitnesses in Kashmir Attack Describe Scenes of Chaos and Horror
item.description: Victims and eyewitnesses described scenes of chaos and horror when militants killed 26 people in Kashmir as families, couples and friends took in a pi...

item.title: Smoke From New Jersey Wildfire Blankets New York City
item.description: The air in the city is unhealthy for some groups because of a fire that has been burning in the Pine Barrens since Tuesday.

item.title: Deadly Airstrikes Hit Ukraine’s Capital
item.description: The deadly overnight attack damaged buildings in Kyiv and killed at least eight people, officials said.

item.title: An E.U. Deforestation Rule Has Ethiopian Coffee Farmers Scrambling
item.description: The measure will require geolocation data to show that beans aren’t linked to deforestation. Farmers say they need more time to prepare.
